message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CV

This paper deals with the problem of machine translation, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses machine learning techniques, which can be classified under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The Bayesian inference method used in the paper is a statistical technique, which can be classified under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper deals with the analysis of translations, which can be classified under cs.CV (Computer Vision) as it involves the comparison of two texts.
